glkjni
Interface GlkSChannel

public interface GlkSChannel

A Glk sound channel.

See the glkjni package for general implementation notes.

Method Summary
 boolean play(int num, int repeats, boolean notify)
          Forwarded from glk_schannel_play_ext.
 void setVolume(int vol)
          Forwarded from glk_schannel_set_volume.
 void stop()
          Forwarded from glk_schannel_stop, or from glk_schannel_play_ext when repeats is zero.
 

Method Detail

setVolume

void setVolume(int vol)
Forwarded from glk_schannel_set_volume.

Sets the volume for the channel.

Parameters:
vol - The volume.

play

boolean play(int num,
             int repeats,
             boolean notify)
Forwarded from glk_schannel_play_ext.

Plays a sound on the channel. If a sound was already playing, it is stopped.

Parameters:
num - The number of the sound resource.

repeats - The number of times to repeat the sound. The value will either be -1 (meaning repeat forever) or a positive number.
notify - True if a sound notification event should occur when the sound finishes playing.
Returns:
True if the sound started playing, false if there was a problem.

stop

void stop()
Forwarded from glk_schannel_stop, or from glk_schannel_play_ext when repeats is zero.

Stops the current sound. If there is no current sound, does nothing.
